details.description: Parcel Management System is a full-stack web application built for managing delivery operations. It includes features for admins, users, and delivery men. Users can book parcels, delivery men can update status, and admins can monitor and manage the entire flow through a secure dashboard.

techStack.frontend: React.js, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, React Router
techStack.tools: Axios, React Hook Form, TanStack Query, Date-fns

challenges: Implementing role-based dashboards for admin, delivery men, and users
Securing backend routes using JWT and verifying user roles
Managing real-time parcel status updates and dynamic table rendering
Optimizing user experience for data fetching, filtering, and delivery tracking
futurePlans: Integrating real-time notifications (e.g., with Socket.io or Firebase)
Implementing payment gateway for parcel bookings

details.description: Bistro Boss Restaurant is a modern and responsive restaurant website showcasing an engaging UI, dynamic menu, customer testimonials, and a streamlined ordering experience. It also includes admin functionalities like adding new menu items and managing users.

techStack.frontend: React.js, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, React Router

challenges: Integrating Firebase authentication with role-based access control for admin routes
Designing a clean, responsive UI across all screen sizes
Handling secure API calls with JWT and protecting routes
Managing conditional rendering and state management for dashboard functionality
futurePlans: Adding multi-language support and dark mode toggle

details.description: Learn Nest is an educational platform designed to streamline the learning process for students and tutors. It offers user role-based dashboards, course browsing, class management, and a seamless, responsive UI with secure authentication and protected routes.

techStack.frontend: React.js, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, React Router
techStack.tools: Axios, Firebase, JWT, React Hook Form, Swiper.js

challenges: Implementing role-based route protection using Firebase Auth and JWT
Creating dynamic dashboards for admin, instructor, and student roles
Managing secure API calls with token-based authentication
Validating form inputs with React Hook Form and handling real-time updates
futurePlans: Adding real-time chat functionality between students and instructors
Course progress tracking and certificate generation

details.description: Group Study is a collaborative academic platform where students can create or join study groups, manage learning sessions, and interact with peers. It also includes a robust assignment management system with role-based dashboard and clean UI.

techStack.frontend: React.js, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, React Router
techStack.tools: Axios, Firebase, JWT, React Hook Form

challenges: Implementing secure login and protecting private study group content
Managing dynamic user roles (admin, member, guest)
Setting up real-time updates for group activities/events
futurePlans: Integrating video call features for virtual group sessions
Gamifying participation with leaderboard and badges
